scripts.release:major: changelog -M -x chore && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major -m 'Release: %s' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m -x chore && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor -m 'Release: %s' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p -x chore && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch -m 'Release: %s' && git push origin && git push origin --tags
